53 #include <stdlib.h>
54 #include "slist.h"
55 
56 slist_node_t* slist_find(slist_t *slist, void *node)
57 {
58  slist_node_t* iterator;
59 
60  slist_foreach(slist,iterator)
61  {
62  if ( iterator == node )
63  {
64  return node;
65  }
66  }
67 
68  return NULL;
69 }
70 
71 slist_node_t* slist_back(slist_t* slist)
72 {
73  slist_node_t *iterator = slist_end(slist);
74 
75  while( slist_next(slist,iterator) != slist_end(slist) )
76  {
77  iterator = slist_next(slist,iterator);
78  }
79 
80  return iterator;
81 }
82 
83 
84 
85 slist_node_t* slist_prev_prev(slist_t *slist, void* node)
86 {
87  slist_node_t *iterator;
88  slist_foreach(slist,iterator)
89  {
90  if( slist_next(slist,slist_next(slist,iterator)) == node )
91  {
92  return iterator;
93  }
94  }
95  return iterator;
96 }
97 
98 
99 
100 slist_node_t* slist_prev(slist_t *slist, void* node)
101 {
102  slist_node_t *iterator = node;
103 
104  while( slist_next(slist,iterator) != node )
105  {
106  iterator = slist_next(slist,iterator);
107  }
108 
109  return iterator;
110 }
111 
112 
113 size_t slist_size(slist_t *slist)
114 {
115  slist_node_t *iterator;
116  size_t size = 0;
117 
118  slist_foreach(slist,iterator)
119  {
120  size++;
121  }
122 
123  return size;
124 }

Counts the number of nodes in a circular singly linked list.

Circular singly linked list.

#define slist_end(slist)
Returns an iterator to the past-the-end element in a circular singly linked list.

#define slist_foreach(slist, iterator)
Iterates through all elements in a circular singly linked list.

#define slist_next(slist, node)
Macro to obtain the next node in a circular singly linked list.

Structure representing a node in a circular singly linked list.
